notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: SY, BW, PO, CH, and TJ designed the study and edited the manuscript. NLV and PKL performed the statistical analysis and wrote the results. HTLD performed the laboratory procedures and assisted in writing the manuscript. DTHT, NVVC, NVK, NC, LL, and EP recruited and managed the patients at each site. NJ analyzed the data and assisted in writing the manuscript. CPS and KDR provided intellectual input to the study and the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
